autotransform.schema package

Submodules

autotransform.schema.builder module

The base class for SchemaBuilders which are used to programatically generate a Schema.

class autotransform.schema.builder.SchemaBuilder

Bases: abc.ABC

The base for SchemaBuilders. SchemaBuilders are used for programatic Schema generation. This can be used in conjunction with params or configuration to customize Schemas run through automation. Can also be used to generate JSON Schemas that can be utilized.

build() → autotransform.schema.schema.AutoTransformSchema

Builds a Schema based on the state of the SchemaBuilder.

Returns

The Schema produced by this SchemaBuilder.

Return type

AutoTransformSchema

dump_to_file(path: str) → None

Dumps the Schema this SchemaBuilder would produce to the file located at the provided path.

Parameters

path (str) – The path of the file to dump the JSON encoded Schema to.

autotransform.schema.config module

A set of configuration options for a schema.

class autotransform.schema.config.Config(allowed_validation_level: autotransform.validator.base.ValidationResultLevel = ValidationResultLevel.NONE)

Bases: object

An object containing all configuration information for a Schema.

The allowed level of validation issues. Any issues raised above this level will trigger exceptions.

autotransform.schema.factory module

A simple factory for producing SchemaBuilders from their type.

class autotransform.schema.factory.SchemaBuilderFactory

Bases: object

The factory class for SchemaBuilders. Maps a type to a SchemaBuilder.

A mapping from SchemaBuilderType to the associated class.

Type

An instance of the associated SchemaBuilder.

Return type

SchemaBuilder

autotransform.schema.schema module

The heart of AutoTransform, AutoTransformSchemas represent all information required to fully execute a change.

class autotransform.schema.schema.AutoTransformSchema(inp: autotransform.input.base.Input, batcher: autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher, transformer: autotransform.transformer.base.Transformer, filters: Optional[List[autotransform.filter.base.Filter]] = None, validators: Optional[List[autotransform.validator.base.Validator]] = None, commands: Optional[List[autotransform.command.base.Command]] = None, repo: Optional[autotransform.repo.base.Repo] = None, config: Optional[autotransform.schema.config.Config] = None)

Bases: object

The heart of AutoTransform, pulls together all components required to execute a transformation.

input

The Input which gets Items.

Type

Input

batcher

The Batcher which batches filtered Items in to logical groups.

Type

Batcher

transformer

The Transformer which actually modifies files.

Type

Transformer

filters

A list of Filters to apply to Items.

Type

List[Filter]

validators

A list of Validators to ensure the changes did not break anything.

Type

List[Validator]

commands

A list of Commands that run post-processing on the changes.

Type

List[Command]

repo

A Repo to control submission of changes to version control or code review systems.

Type

Optional[Repo]

config

Any configuration needed by the schema so that it can run.

Type

Config

batcher: autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher
bundle() → Dict[str, Any]

Bundles the Schema in to a format that can be JSON encoded.

Returns

The bundled data of the Schema.

Return type

Dict[str, Any]

commands: List[autotransform.command.base.Command]
config: autotransform.schema.config.Config
execute_batch(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Executes changes for a batch, including setting up the Repo, running the Transformer, checking all Validators, running Commands, submitting changes if present, and rewinding the Repo if changes are submitted.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch to execute.

Raises

ValidationError – If one of the Schema’s Validators fails raises an exception.

filters: List[autotransform.filter.base.Filter]
static from_bundle(bundle: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.schema.schema.AutoTransformSchema

Takes a bundle of information from a source like JSON and produces the associated Schema.

Parameters

Returns

Return type

autotransform.schema.type module

The type of SchemaBuilder, used create a 1:1 mapping.

class autotransform.schema.type.SchemaBuilderType(value)

Bases: str, enum.Enum

A simple enum for 1:1 SchemaBuilder to type mapping.

Module contents

Schemas are the heart of AutoTransform. They contain all necesary components and configuration to deploy a change.
